statuses.full_text:
@LanceForman still estimated to be only 1% of global GDP.

You seem to be focussing only on displacement of people because of sea level rise. I don't know where you got your figure from, the Royal Society puts it at 187m people.
So, we simply 'move them to higher ground' do we!
187m is ~3x

NASA predicts the global sea rise will rise up to another 8 feet by 2100 from melting land ice and the expansion of seawater. Storm surges will combine with this sea level rise and cause an increase in flooding. Venice is already flooding.  #ChangeforClimateChange
@ABC Sea level rise .. .
